Name: Meredith Schomburg
Title: Designer
About:
As a designer I am an advocate for human-centered research, clever visual solutions and witty storytelling. I am constantly looking for ways to use design as an opportunity to serve others and solve problems.

A native to Raleigh and recent graduate of the College of Design at NC State, I am passionate about contributing to and helping grow the creative community of Raleigh and Durham - it’s one of the many reasons I chose to stick around the area a bit longer. Prior to joining Smashing Boxes I interned as a communications designer at IDEO Boston, where I fell even more in love with the process of complex design thinking and creative problem solving. While finishing up school I also jumped around as a freelancer for a variety of clients where I focused on helping establish better brand identities.

I constantly seek out opportunities to learn new things, be it design related or not. I am continually intrigued by the world of fashion, and my side passion projects often involve some sort of collaboration with a designer or maker in that field. When I’m not working away on some sort of design endeavor, I’m with people - I’m your classic extrovert. Sure, I have hobbies, but I really just enjoy doing life with others, whatever activity that entails. Exploring and trying new things are immensely more exciting to me when it involves fellow humans.
